round_best: Develop a hybrid diffusion model that leverages an adaptive temporal attention mechanism, which dynamically adjusts the influence of forward and backward frames based on the complexity and motion content of the specific scene. This model would use a scene-aware gating mechanism to blend multiple potential pathways, optimizing for the least off-manifold trajectory. By incorporating real-time feedback on frame generation quality, the model could iteratively refine its predictions, potentially reducing artifacts and enhancing the fluidity of the generated video with fewer re-noising steps.
